# setAchievementCompleted(_:)

**Instance Method**

Set progress to 100% for an achievement for a player.

## Declaration

```swift
func setAchievementCompleted(_ achievement: GKAchievement)
```

## Discussion

The system reports achievement completion when the activity ends.

## Getting and removing achievements

- **achievements**: All achievements that have been associated with this activity.
- **removeAchievements(_:)**: Removes all achievements if they exist.
- **progress(on:)**: Get the achievement progress from a specific achievement of the local player if previously set.
- **setProgress(on:to:)**: Set a progress for an achievement for a player.
